programme.title: I'm Quitting Heroing - Strive To Ease The Burden On Your Future Self! 勇者、辭職不幹了 - EP2
programme.desc: Leo temperately joins the Demon Army. He must do something to help rebuild the army to join officially.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Murders in B éarn
programme.desc: At the foot of the majestic Béarn mountains, the wife of a notable, dressed as a medieval queen, is discovered drowned under the La Légende bridge in Sauveterre-de-Béarn. The exact spot where, in the 12th century, Queen Sancie was condemned to drowning for infanticide...

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Amerika Square
programme.desc: In modern-day Athens, a racist local disrupts the escape plans of a Syrian doctor and an African Singer who both want to smuggle out of Greece. As time runs out, tattoo artist Billy steps in to organize their desperate escape.

programme.title: Esteban
programme.desc: In Cuba, while helping his single mother sell black market beauty products, a 9-year-old boy dreams of becoming a pianist.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.
